Hi there! I am a junior at Florida State University majoring in psychology and biomathematics. I have broad interests in human memory, perception, and learning â€“ and in particular how sleep contributes to these aspects of our cognition. I hope to pursue a Ph.D. in cognitive neuroscience studying these topics through neuroimaging and computational techniques.



Currently, I am an undergraduate research assistant in the Martin Memory Lab where I am studying how we selectively retrieve semantic and episodic information using fMRI.



News:

March 2023
I received an IDEA grant to research memory in the Memory & Perception Lab @ the University of Toronto!
